description: Enterprise techniques used by certutil, ATT&CK software S0160 v1.2
name: certutil (S0160)

techniques.comment: [certutil](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0160) has been used to decode binaries hidden inside certificate files as Base64 information.(Citation: Malwarebytes Targeted Attack against Saudi Arabia)
[certutil](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0160) can be used to download files from a given URL.(Citation: TechNet Certutil)(Citation: LOLBAS Certutil)

[certutil](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0160) can be used to install browser root certificates as a precursor to performing [Adversary-in-the-Middle](https://attack.mitre.org/techniques/T1557) between connections to banking websites. Example command: certutil -addstore -f -user ROOT ProgramData\cert512121.der.(Citation: Palo Alto Retefe)
